sections.heading: Appointment of successor tutor or undertutorWhen a tutor or undertutor dies, is removed, or resigns, another tutor or undertutor shall be appointed in his place in the manner provided for an original appointment
sections.text: Appointment of successor tutor or undertutorWhen a tutor or undertutor dies, is removed, or resigns, another tutor or undertutor shall be appointed in his place in the manner provided for an original appointment.
